name: War Of The Dukes
description:
What is it?

War of the Dukes is a chess-like board game loosely inspired by "The Duke" by Catalyst Game Labs.

Place your units on a 6x6 board and move them around to capture enemy units. The first to capture the opposing duke wins the game!

The purpose?

This game was made for the mobile programming course @ Master Game Dev - University of Verona
